#### Divider Rounders, Dough Processors

# DR14 – Countertop Divider Rounder

Semi-automatic dough divider-rounder. This model is able to cut and round
660-840 pieces of dough per hour. The portions can weigh from 3.9 to 10.6 oz
with the cutting group dividing into 14 sections. The machine is extremely
easy to use, compact and very practical.

More Info

Get a Quote

Find a Dealer

## Get Started!

## _Find A Sales Representative Near You!_

Univex offers a 24/7/365 Technical Hotline, 1-800-261-9261, for all your
technical and operational needs.

Learn More

###  ____ Models

#### DR11 – Countertop Divider Rounder

Product Detail

###  ____ Features

  * Dough Divider-Rounder (3.9 to 10.6 oz.) – 110/60/1
  * Bench model Divider and Rounder
  * Manual cutting 14 portions
  * Automatic Rounding with Timer
  * Availible 5 different size cup trays
  * Cup Tray “A” white: 8.8 to 10.6 oz
  * Cup Tray “B” green: 6.2 to 7.9 oz
  * Cup Tray “C” red: 5.3 to 7.1 oz
  * Cup Tray “D” white: 3.9 to 5.3 oz
  * Cup Tray “H” white: 7.8 to 9.3 oz

###  ____ Applications

  * Supermarkets
  * Schools
  * Pizzerias
  * Restaurants
  * Country Clubs
  * Chains

###  ____ Accessories

  * 14 section clear dough plate
  * 14 section cutting group
  * 14 section stainless dish

###  ____ Factory Installed Options

### WE RAISE THE BAR. WE SET THE STANDARD. CALL 1-800-258-6358 TO LEARN MORE

Based in Salem, New Hampshire, Univex has sales offices throughout North
America as well as a network of over  
1,000 dealers who supply Univex equipment to tens of thousands of food service
operators worldwide.

Let us supply you with the ideal solution for working more efficiently.
